Instruction: Combine buttermilk, oil, and mayonnaise in a large bowl. Gradually mix in the flour until well combined.

Knead the dough on a floured surface until smooth, adding more flour if needed. Pat the dough out to 1/2-inch thickness and cut into pieces using a biscuit cutter. Transfer the biscuits to an oiled cast iron skillet and let them rest for 10 minutes in the pan.
Bake in an oven preheated to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) until the biscuits are nicely browned, which should take around 20 minutes.
